associated_activity_logs.name: IPA Phone Screen
associated_activity_logs.extra_log_types:
start_phone_screen:
  label: Start Phone Screening
  fields:
  references:
    ipa_ps_initial_screening:
      from: this
      add: one_to_this
  caption_before:
    all_fields: Record initial screening responses. If necessary, enter a date and time to follow up. 
    submit: If the subject is ready to continue, save this form, and continue with the Football Experience form.
  view_options:
    show_embedded_at_top: true
  creatable_if: 
    not_any:
      dynamic_model__ipa_ps_initial_screenings:
        select_still_interested: "yes"
  editable_if:
    not_any:
      activity_log__ipa_assignment_phone_screens:
        extra_log_type: finalize
  save_action:
    on_create:
      create_next_creatable:
        if: 
          all:
            dynamic_model__ipa_ps_initial_screenings:
              select_still_interested: "yes"
      show_panel:
        value: activity_log__ipa_assignments
        if:
          not_any:
            dynamic_model__ipa_ps_initial_screenings:
              select_still_interested: "yes"
      hide_panel:
        value: activity_log__ipa_assignment_phone_screens
        if:
          not_any:
            dynamic_model__ipa_ps_initial_screenings:
              select_still_interested: "yes"


section_1:
  label: Football Experience
  fields: 
  references:
    ipa_ps_football_experience:
      from: this
      add: one_to_this
  creatable_if: 
    all:
      activity_log__ipa_assignment_phone_screens:
        extra_log_type: start_phone_screen
      dynamic_model__ipa_ps_initial_screenings:
        select_still_interested: "yes"        
    not_any:
      activity_log__ipa_assignment_phone_screens:
        extra_log_type: section_1
  editable_if:
    not_any:
      activity_log__ipa_assignment_phone_screens:
        extra_log_type: finalize
  save_action:
    on_create: create_next_creatable


section_2:
  label: Size
  fields: 
  references:
    ipa_ps_size:
      from: this
      add: one_to_this
  creatable_if: 
    all:
      activity_log__ipa_assignment_phone_screens:
        extra_log_type: section_1
    not_any:
      activity_log__ipa_assignment_phone_screens:
        extra_log_type: section_2
  editable_if:
    not_any:
      activity_log__ipa_assignment_phone_screens:
        extra_log_type: finalize
  save_action:
    on_create: create_next_creatable


health_1:
  label: Health
  fields: 
  references:
    ipa_ps_health:
      from: this
      add: one_to_this
  creatable_if: 
    all:
      activity_log__ipa_assignment_phone_screens:
        extra_log_type: section_2
    not_any:
      activity_log__ipa_assignment_phone_screens:
        extra_log_type: health_1
  editable_if:
    not_any:
      activity_log__ipa_assignment_phone_screens:
        extra_log_type: finalize
  save_action:
    on_create: create_next_creatable

sleep_1:
  label: Sleep
  fields: 
  references:
    ipa_ps_sleep:
      from: this
      add: one_to_this
  creatable_if: 
    all:
      activity_log__ipa_assignment_phone_screens:
        extra_log_type: health_1
    not_any:
      activity_log__ipa_assignment_phone_screens:
        extra_log_type: sleep_1
  editable_if:
    not_any:
      activity_log__ipa_assignment_phone_screens:
        extra_log_type: finalize
  save_action:
    on_create: create_next_creatable

mri_1:
  label: MRI
  fields: 
  references:
    ipa_ps_mri:
      from: this
      add: one_to_this
  creatable_if: 
    all:
      activity_log__ipa_assignment_phone_screens:
        extra_log_type: sleep_1
    not_any:
      activity_log__ipa_assignment_phone_screens:
        extra_log_type: mri_1
  editable_if:
    not_any:
      activity_log__ipa_assignment_phone_screens:
        extra_log_type: finalize
  save_action:
    on_create: create_next_creatable


tms_1:
  label: TMS
  fields: 
  references:
    ipa_ps_tms_test:
      from: this
      add: one_to_this
  creatable_if: 
    all:
      activity_log__ipa_assignment_phone_screens:
        extra_log_type: mri_1
    not_any:
      activity_log__ipa_assignment_phone_screens:
        extra_log_type: tms_1
  editable_if:
    not_any:
      activity_log__ipa_assignment_phone_screens:
        extra_log_type: finalize
  save_action:
    on_create: create_next_creatable

schedule_callback:
  label: Schedule Callback
  fields:
    - callback_date
    - callback_time
    - notes
  caption_before:
    all_fields: |
      Thank you for your patience and for answering these previous questions.
      Please note that if you are eligible and enroll in this pilot study, we will keep this information with your research records. If you are not eligible or choose not to participate we will destroy it.
      I have recorded your answers to the questions and these will be reviewed by a study physician to determine whether you are eligible for the pilot study. We will then contact you to let you know if you are eligible or not. If you are eligible, we will let you know the next steps.
      Do you have any questions?
      We will call you back to inform you of your eligibility status. What is a good day/time to call you?

    submit: If you have any questions in the meantime, please do not hesitate to contact us. Thank you again for your time.
  creatable_if: 
    all:
      activity_log__ipa_assignment_phone_screens:
        extra_log_type: tms_1
    not_any:
      activity_log__ipa_assignment_phone_screens:
        extra_log_type: schedule_callback
  editable_if:
    not_any:
      activity_log__ipa_assignment_phone_screens:
        extra_log_type: finalize

  save_action:
    on_create: create_next_creatable


tmoca_1:
  label: T-MoCA
  fields:
  references:
    ipa_ps_tmoca:
      from: this
      add: one_to_this
  creatable_if: 
    all:
      activity_log__ipa_assignment_phone_screens:
        extra_log_type: schedule_callback
    not_any:
      activity_log__ipa_assignment_phone_screens:
        extra_log_type: tmoca_1
  editable_if:
    not_any:
      activity_log__ipa_assignment_phone_screens:
        extra_log_type: finalize

finalize:
  label: Finalize Entries
  caption_before:
    all_fields: |
      Save this entry to lock the phone screen forms and generate an inclusion/exclusion checklist record.
      Click the cancel button instead if review or revision of the phone screen forms is still required.
  creatable_if:
    all:
      activity_log__ipa_assignment_phone_screens:
        extra_log_type: tmoca_1
    not_any:
      activity_log__ipa_assignment_phone_screens:
        extra_log_type: finalize
  editable_if:
    not_any:
      activity_log__ipa_assignment_phone_screens:
        extra_log_type: finalize
  save_action:
    on_create:
      show_panel:
        value: activity_log__ipa_assignment_inex_checklists
      hide_panel:
        value: activity_log__ipa_assignment_phone_screens

associated_activity_logs.name: Inclusion / Exclusion

ready_for_review_no_yes references: ipa_inex_checklist: from: this add: one_to_this filter_by: fixed_checklist_type: baseline review caption_before: all_fields: Fill out the checklist. ready_for_review_no_yes: When the checklist is ready for review by the PI, select yes. submit: If ready for review is marked yes, clicking Save will notify the PI. creatable_if: all: activity_log__ipa_assignment_inex_checklists: extra_log_type: sign_phone_screen_staff signed_no_yes: "yes" not_any: activity_log__ipa_assignment_inex_checklists: extra_log_type: baseline_review editable_if: not_all: activity_log__ipa_assignment_inex_checklists: extra_log_type: sign_baseline signed_no_yes: "yes" view_options: show_embedded_at_top: true sign_baseline: label: Sign Baseline Review (PI) fields: - signed_no_yes caption_before: all_fields: Sign the checklist by selecting yes in the signed field. creatable_if: not_all: activity_log__ipa_assignment_inex_checklists: extra_log_type: sign_baseline_staff signed_no_yes: "yes" all: activity_log__ipa_assignment_inex_checklists: extra_log_type: sign_baseline signed_no_yes: "yes" editable_if: not_all: activity_log__ipa_assignment_inex_checklists: extra_log_type: sign_baseline_staff signed_no_yes: "yes" save_action: on_create: show_panel: value: activity_log__ipa_assignments if: any: activity_log__ipa_assignment_inex_checklists: extra_log_type: sign_baseline_staff signed_no_yes: "yes" hide_panel: value: activity_log__ipa_assignment_inex_checklists if: any: activity_log__ipa_assignment_inex_checklists: extra_log_type: sign_baseline_staff signed_no_yes: "yes"

associated_activity_logs.name: IPA Tracker
associated_activity_logs.extra_log_types:
_default:
  view_options:
    hide_unless_creatable: true

schedule_screening:
  label: Schedule Screening
  fields: 
    - select_who
    - select_record_from_player_contacts
    - follow_up_when
    - follow_up_time
    - notes
  caption_before:
    select_who: Who will perform the phone screening?
    select_record_from_player_contacts: Phone number to call
    follow_up_when: Scheduled date
    follow_up_time: Scheduled time (Eastern Time)
    notes: Additional notes for the screener    
  creatable_if:
    not_any:
      activity_log__ipa_assignments:
        extra_log_type: screening_follow_up


screening_follow_up:
  label: Schedule Screening Follow Up
  fields: 
    - select_who
    - select_record_from_player_contacts
    - follow_up_when
    - follow_up_time
    - notes
  caption_before:
    select_who: Who will perform the phone screening follow up?
    select_record_from_player_contacts: Phone number to call
    follow_up_when: Scheduled date
    follow_up_time: Scheduled time (Eastern Time)
    notes: Additional notes
  creatable_if:
    all:
      activity_log__ipa_assignments:
        extra_log_type: screening_follow_up
    not_any:
      activity_log__ipa_assignments:
        extra_log_type: appointment  
      
perform_screening_follow_up:
  label: Screening Follow Up
  references:
    ipa_screening:
      from: master
      add: one_to_master
  caption_before:
    all_fields: Record the eligibility of the participant and any additional notes from the phone screening follow up.
    submit: If unable to complete the follow up, and it is necessary to schedule a repeat follow up in the future, add a Schedule Screening Follow Up to set a time.
  creatable_if:
    all:
      activity_log__ipa_assignments:
        extra_log_type: screening_follow_up
    not_any:
      activity_log__ipa_assignments:
        extra_log_type: appointment
      

appointment:
  label: Appointment
  fields:

  references:
    ipa_appointment:
      from: master
      add: one_to_master
  creatable_if:
    all:
      activity_log__ipa_assignments:
        extra_log_type: perform_screening_follow_up

contact_info:
  label: Emergency Contacts & MRN
  fields:

  references:

    emergency_contact:
      from: master
      add: many   

    mrn_number:
      from: master
      add: many   
  creatable_if:
    all:
      activity_log__ipa_assignments:
        extra_log_type: appointment

transportation_and_housing:
  label: Transportation and Housing
  fields:
  references:
    ipa_transportation:
      from: master
      add: many
      limit: 2
    ipa_hotel:
      from: master
      add: one_to_master
  creatable_if:
    all:
      activity_log__ipa_assignments:
        extra_log_type: appointment

consent_mailing:
  label: Consent Mailing
  fields: 
  references:
    ipa_consent_mailing:
      from: master
      add: one_to_master

payments:
  label: Payments
  fields:
  references:
    ipa_payment:
      from: master
      add: many
      limit: 2
  creatable_if:
    any:
      activity_log__ipa_assignments:
        extra_log_type: screening_follow_up

withdraw:
  label: Withdraw
  fields:
  references:
    ipa_withdrawal:
      from: master
      add: one_to_master
  creatable_if:
    any:
      activity_log__ipa_assignments:
        extra_log_type: schedule_screening


follow_up_surveys:
  label: Follow Up Surveys
  fields: 
  references:
    ipa_survey:
      from: master
      add: many
      limit: 2
  creatable_if:
    any:
      activity_log__ipa_assignments:
        extra_log_type:
          - withdraw
          - appointment


general:
  label: General Communications
  fields:
    - select_activity
    - activity_date
    - select_record_from_player_contacts
    - select_record_from_addresses
    - select_direction
    - select_who
    - select_result
    - select_next_step
    - follow_up_when
    - follow_up_time
    - notes
  field_options:
    select_record_from_player_contacts:
      include_blank: yes
    select_record_from_addresses:
      include_blank: yes
  caption_before:
    select_record_from_player_contacts: The phone or email address, or...
    select_record_from_addresses: ... mailing address for the communication 
    select_result: Is a follow up required, or is this communication complete?
    notes: Notes regarding this communication or to assist with the follow up
  show_if:
    select_next_step:
      select_result: follow up
    follow_up_when:
      select_result: follow up
    follow_up_time:
      select_result: follow up

associated_activity_logs.name: Navigation
associated_activity_logs.extra_log_types: station_event: label: Station Event fields: - event_date - select_station - arrival_time - start_time - event_notes - completion_time - participant_feedback_notes - other_navigator_notes caption_before: add_protocol_deviation_record_no_yes: keep_label: true caption: If the event involved a protocol deviation or adverse event, select yes and save this event, then complete the appropriate form. reference_activity_log__ipa_assignment_protocol_deviation: If necessary, create a protocol deviation or adverse event record. references: activity_log__ipa_assignment_protocol_deviation: label: Protocol Deviation Record from: this add: many add_with: extra_log_type: deviation_record deviation_occurred_when: "{{event_date}}" deviation_discovered_when: "{{event_date}}" activity_log__ipa_assignment_adverse_event: label: Adverse Event from: this add: many add_with: extra_log_type: adverse_event_record event_occurred_when: "{{event_date}}" event_discovered_when: "{{event_date}}" general_event: label: General Event fields: - event_date - select_event_type - other_event_type - start_time - event_notes - completion_time - participant_feedback_notes - other_navigator_notes show_if: other_event_type: select_event_type: other caption_before: add_protocol_deviation_record_no_yes: keep_label: true caption: If the event involved a protocol deviation or adverse event, select yes and save this event, then complete the appropriate form. reference_activity_log__ipa_assignment_protocol_deviation: If necessary, create a protocol deviation or adverse event record. references: activity_log__ipa_assignment_protocol_deviation: label: Protocol Deviation Record from: this add: many add_with: extra_log_type: deviation_record deviation_occurred_when: "{{event_date}}" deviation_discovered_when: "{{event_date}}" activity_log__ipa_assignment_adverse_event: label: Adverse Event from: this add: many add_with: extra_log_type: adverse_event_record event_occurred_when: "{{event_date}}" event_discovered_when: "{{event_date}}"

associated_activity_logs.name: Adverse Events
associated_activity_logs.extra_log_types: _default: view_options: hide_unless_creatable: true always_embed_reference: dynamic_model__ipa_adverse_event adverse_event_record: label: Record Adverse Event fields: editable_if: not_all: activity_log__ipa_assignment_adverse_events: extra_log_type: pi_review id: this_references: id references: - dynamic_model__ipa_adverse_event: from: this add: one_to_this - activity_log__ipa_assignment_adverse_event: label: Initial Review from: this add: one_to_this add_with: extra_log_type: initial_review filter_by: extra_log_type: initial_review creatable_if: all: activity_log__ipa_assignment_adverse_events: extra_log_type: adverse_event_record id: this: id not_all: activity_log__ipa_assignment_adverse_events: extra_log_type: initial_review id: this: id - activity_log__ipa_assignment_adverse_event: label: PI Review from: this add: one_to_this add_with: extra_log_type: pi_review filter_by: extra_log_type: pi_review creatable_if: all: activity_log__ipa_assignment_adverse_events: extra_log_type: initial_review id: this_references: id dynamic_model__ipa_adverse_events: select_relatedness: - related - possibly related select_expectedness: unexpected id: this_references: id any: dynamic_model__ipa_adverse_events: select_location: internal select_severity: serious not_all: activity_log__ipa_assignment_adverse_events: extra_log_type: pi_review id: this_references: id - activity_log__ipa_assignment_adverse_event: label: Report to IRB from: this add: one_to_this add_with: extra_log_type: report_to_irb filter_by: extra_log_type: report_to_irb creatable_if: all: activity_log__ipa_assignment_adverse_events: extra_log_type: pi_review id: this_references: id dynamic_model__ipa_adverse_events: select_relatedness: - related - possibly related select_expectedness: unexpected id: this_references: id any: dynamic_model__ipa_adverse_events: select_location: internal select_severity: serious not_all: activity_log__ipa_assignment_adverse_events: extra_log_type: report_to_irb id: this_references: id initial_review: label: Completed Initial Review caption_before: submit: Review the Adverse Event and update the details and severity if necessary. When complete, click Complete. If the incident is internal or serious, and unexpected and related / possibly related the PI will be notified. save_action: label: Complete showable_if: never: true creatable_if: never: true pi_review: label: Complete PI Review caption_before: submit: Review the Adverse Event. When complete, click Complete. If the incident is internal or serious, and unexpected and related / possibly related, a staff member will be notified and will complete the report for the IRB. save_action: label: Complete showable_if: never: true creatable_if: never: true report_to_irb: label: Completed Report to IRB caption_before: submit: When the internal or serious, and unexpected and related / possibly related Adverse Event has been reported to the IRB, click Complete. save_action: label: Complete showable_if: never: true creatable_if: never: true

associated_activity_logs.name: IPA Protocol Deviations
associated_activity_logs.extra_log_types: _default: view_options: hide_unless_creatable: true, always_embed_reference: dynamic_model__ipa_protocol_deviation deviation_record: label: Protocol Deviation fields: editable_if: not_all: activity_log__ipa_assignment_protocol_deviations: extra_log_type: pi_review id: this_references: id references: - dynamic_model__ipa_protocol_deviation: from: this add: one_to_this - activity_log__ipa_assignment_protocol_deviation: label: Initial Review from: this add: one_to_this add_with: extra_log_type: initial_review filter_by: extra_log_type: initial_review creatable_if: all: activity_log__ipa_assignment_protocol_deviations: extra_log_type: deviation_record id: this: id not_all: activity_log__ipa_assignment_protocol_deviations: extra_log_type: initial_review id: this: id - activity_log__ipa_assignment_protocol_deviation: label: PI Review from: this add: one_to_this add_with: extra_log_type: pi_review filter_by: extra_log_type: pi_review creatable_if: all: activity_log__ipa_assignment_protocol_deviations: extra_log_type: initial_review id: this_references: id dynamic_model__ipa_protocol_deviations: select_severity: major id: this_references: id not_all: activity_log__ipa_assignment_protocol_deviations: extra_log_type: pi_review id: this_references: id - activity_log__ipa_assignment_protocol_deviation: label: Report to IRB from: this add: one_to_this add_with: extra_log_type: report_to_irb filter_by: extra_log_type: report_to_irb creatable_if: all: activity_log__ipa_assignment_protocol_deviations: extra_log_type: pi_review id: this_references: id dynamic_model__ipa_protocol_deviations: select_severity: major id: this_references: id not_all: activity_log__ipa_assignment_protocol_deviations: extra_log_type: report_to_irb id: this_references: id initial_review: label: Completed Initial Review caption_before: submit: Review the protocol deviation and update the details and severity if necessary. When complete, click Complete. If the severity is Major, the PI will be notified. save_action: label: Complete showable_if: never: true creatable_if: never: true pi_review: label: Complete PI Review caption_before: submit: Review the protocol deviation. When complete, click Complete. If the severity is Major, a staff member will be notified and will complete the report for the IRB. save_action: label: Complete showable_if: never: true creatable_if: never: true report_to_irb: label: Completed Report to IRB caption_before: submit: When the major protocol deviation has been reported to the IRB, click Complete. save_action: label: Complete showable_if: never: true creatable_if: never: true

associated_dynamic_models.name: Emergency Contact
associated_dynamic_models.options:
default:
  valid_if:
    on_save:
      not_any:
        this:
          first_name: ''
          last_name: ''

      any:
        this:
          rec_type: email
          all:
            this:
                rec_type: phone
                all:
                  this:
                    data:
                      validate:
                        phone: true
      any2:
        this:
          rec_type: phone
          all:
            this:
                rec_type: email
                all:
                  this:
                    data:
                      validate:
                        email: true

associated_dynamic_models.name: Inclusion Exclusion Checklist
associated_dynamic_models.options:
default: caption_before: ix_consent_blank_yes_no: Subject able to give informed consent and willing and able to comply with study procedures ix_consent_details: Notes ix_not_pro_blank_yes_no: Not a former professional football player ix_not_pro_details: Notes ix_age_range_blank_yes_no: Aged 24-55 ix_age_range_details: Notes ix_weight_ok_blank_yes_no: Weight 450lbs ix_weight_ok_details: Notes ix_no_seizure_blank_yes_no: No history of seizure disorder ix_no_seizure_details: Notes ix_no_device_impl_blank_yes_no: No device implants such as cardiac pacemakers or perfusion pumps that cannot be removed ix_no_device_impl_details: Notes ix_no_ferromagnetic_impl_blank_yes_no: No ferromagnetic implants or objects that cannot be removed such as aneurysm clips, surgical clips, prostheses, artificial hearts, valves with steel parts, metal fragments, shrapnel, tattoos near the eye, or steel implants or jewelry ix_no_ferromagnetic_impl_details: Notes ix_diagnosed_sleep_apnea_blank_yes_no:

Phase 2-specific
Must meet criteria for at least one of below

Self-report of having had a healthcare provider diagnose sleep apnea

ix_diagnosed_sleep_apnea_details: Notes ix_diagnosed_heart_stroke_or_meds_blank_yes_no: "Self-report of having had a healthcare provider diagnose heart attack or stroke or having ever been prescribed or currently taking medications for two of the three following conditions: hypertension, diabetes, or high cholesterol" ix_diagnosed_heart_stroke_or_meds_details: Notes ix_chronic_pain_and_meds_blank_yes_no: Self-report of chronic pain and current management of chronic pain by either over the counter or prescription medication or alternative therapies ix_chronic_pain_and_meds_details: Notes ix_tmoca_score_blank_yes_no: Telephone Montreal Cognitive Assessment (T-MoCA) score of 19 out of 22 total points ix_tmoca_score_details: Notes ix_no_hemophilia_blank_yes_no:

QST

No history of hemophilia

ix_no_hemophilia_details: Notes ix_raynauds_ok_blank_yes_no: No moderate to severe Raynauds disease ix_raynauds_ok_details: Notes ix_mi_ok_blank_yes_no: No recent MI ix_mi_ok_details: Notes ix_bicycle_ok_blank_yes_no:

Cardiac

Able to sit on and pedal a bicycle

associated_dynamic_models.name: IPA Initial Screening
associated_dynamic_models.options:
default:
  dialog_before:
    select_is_good_time_to_speak: 
      name: ipa ps intro
      label: show script
    select_may_i_begin: 
      name: ipa ps intro 2
      label: show script
    any_questions_blank_yes_no: 
      name: ipa ps intro 3
      label: show script
    select_still_interested: 
      name: ipa ps intro 4
      label: show script
  show_if:
    select_may_i_begin:
      select_is_good_time_to_speak: "yes"      
    any_questions_blank_yes_no:
      select_may_i_begin: "yes"
    select_still_interested:
      all:
        any_questions_blank_yes_no: 
          - "yes"
          - "no"
    follow_up_date:
      any:
        select_is_good_time_to_speak: not appropriate time
        select_may_i_begin: not appropriate time
        select_still_interested: yes - call back
    follow_up_time:
      any:
        select_is_good_time_to_speak: not appropriate time
        select_may_i_begin: not appropriate time
        select_still_interested: yes - call back

  caption_before:
    select_is_good_time_to_speak: Is this a good time to speak?
    select_may_i_begin: May I begin?
    any_questions_blank_yes_no: I am going to go over the study in some more detail. Do you have any questions so far?
    select_still_interested: Are you still interested in hearing more about the study or do you have any additional questions? (offer to mail materials and call them back if they want to review materials)
    follow_up_date: Enter a follow up date and time if the subject wishes for a call back before continuing with the screening. 
    follow_up_time: Follow up time
    notes: Notes, questions or other information for follow up

May I continue? convulsion_or_seizue_blank_yes_no_dont_know: Have you ever had a convulsion or a seizure? epilepsy_blank_yes_no_dont_know: Do you or a family member have a history of epilepsy? fainting_blank_yes_no_dont_know: Have you ever had a fainting spell or syncope? concussion_blank_yes_no_dont_know: Have you ever had a head trauma that was diagnosed as a concussion or was associated with a loss of consciousness? hearing_problems_blank_yes_no_dont_know: Do you have any hearing problems or ringing in your ears? cochlear_implants_blank_yes_no_dont_know: Do you have cochlear implants? metal_blank_yes_no_dont_know: Do you have any metal in the brain, skull or elsewhere in the body? This can include splinters, fragments, clips, etc. metal_details: IF YES, please specify what type of metal. neurostimulator_blank_yes_no_dont_know: Do you have an implanted neurostimulator in your body? This can include a vagal nerve stimulator, deep brain stimulator, epidural/subdural stimulator, etc. neurostimulator_details: IF YES , specify the type of neurostimulator. pacemaker_blank_yes_no_dont_know: Do you have a cardiac pacemaker or intracardiac lines? med_infusion_device_blank_yes_no_dont_know: Do you have a medication infusion device? past_tms_blank_yes_no_dont_know: Did you ever undergo TMS in the past? past_tms_details: IF YES , were there any problems? Please describe. past_mri_blank_yes_no_dont_know: Did you ever undergo an MRI in the past? past_mri_details: IF YES , were there any problems? Please describe. current_meds_blank_yes_no_dont_know: Are you currently taking any medications including over the counter medications? current_meds_details: IF YES , please list them. neuro_history_details: Please list all past neurological (relating to your brain or spinal cord) medical or surgical history. other_chronic_problems_blank_yes_no_dont_know: Do you have a history of any other chronic health problems? other_chronic_problems_details: IF YES Please tell me about them hospital_visits_blank_yes_no_dont_know: Have you experienced any hospitalizations or emergency room visits in the last six months? hospital_visits_details: IF YES Please tell me what happened dietary_restrictions_blank_yes_no_dont_know: Do you have any dietary restrictions or allergies? dietary_restrictions_details: IF YES Could you tell me what dietary restrictions/allergies you have? anything_else_blank_yes_no: Is there anything else that you want to tell me about? anything_else_details: IF YES Please tell me

associated_reports.name: Search IPA Subject
associated_reports.description:
Search players by name, phone, email or ID.
Leave the search field empty to see all subjects.
associated_reports.sql:
select distinct m.id master_id, 
pi.first_name, pi.middle_name, pi.last_name, pi.nick_name,
a.street, a.street2, a.city, a.state, a.zip, 
pc.data, pc.rec_type
from masters m
inner join player_infos pi
on pi.master_id = m.id 
inner join ipa_assignments b
on m.id = b.master_id
left join addresses a
on m.id = a.master_id
left join player_contacts pc
on pc.master_id = m.id
where 
(:name is null 
or pi.first_name ~* :name
or pi.last_name ~* :name
or pi.middle_name ~* :name
or pi.nick_name ~* :name
or( 
    pi.first_name ~* coalesce(split_part(:name, ' ', 1),'none')
    AND pi.last_name ~* coalesce(split_part(:name, ' ', 2),'none')
  )
) OR
(
regexp_replace(pc.data, '\W+', '', 'g') ~* regexp_replace(:name, '\W+', '', 'g')
) OR
(
b.ipa_id::varchar = :name
)
associated_reports.search_attrs:
name: 
  text: 
    all: true
    multiple: single
